Class FITSHDUChooser

java.lang.Object

                          +--jsky.image.fits.gui.FITSHDUChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class FITSHDUChooser
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Displays a window listing the HDU extensions in the current FITS image and allows the user to select the one to display.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

FITSHDUChooser

public FITSHDUChooser(java.awt.Component parent,
                      MainImageDisplay imageDisplay,
                      FITSImage fitsImage)
Pop up a window displaying FITS HDU information and let the user choose the HDU/extension to display.
Parameters:
parent - The top level parent frame (or internal frame) used to close the window
imageDisplay - The image display window
fitsImage - The FITSImage object returned by the "#fits_image" property for FITS images
